formalpara.title: Figure 4: Pristionchus phylogeny.
formalpara.para: Phylogenic maximum likelihood tree based on SSU sequences of the genus Pristionchus. The sequence of Koerneria sp. was included as the closest related genus to Pristionchus. The phylogenetic relationship was inferred by the heuristic search algorithm of the PAUP*4.0b10 program using the default settings under the maximum likelihood criterion. The tree was rooted at midpoint. Hermaphroditic and gonochoristic species are indicated. Numbers at nodes indicate bootstrap values after 1000 replications. Reprinted from Herrmann et al., (2006), with permission from Elsevier.
